titleStmt.title: An impartial account of some of the transactions in Scotland, concerning the Earl of Broadalban, Viscount and Master of Stair, Glenco-men, Bishop of Galloway, and Mr. Duncan Robertson in a letter from a friend.
titleStmt.author: Friend.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
